mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_comment(uid, content, cdate) VALUES (#{uid}, #{content}, #{cdate})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_comment SET report = #{report} WHERE cid = #{cid}
mapper.select: SELECT cid, username, content, cdate, report FROM tb_comment, tb_user_info WHERE tb_user_info.uid = tb_comment.uid AND report = 1
